thread.title: Linda Shepherd

author: Linda Shepherd
title: Linda Shepherd
text: I am Absolutely satisfied with AMIClubwear... I have never been this satisfied any where else I have shopped. They have the best clothes ever. I have bought several dresses and a few pairs of heels and they have all been very beautiful and high quality. I have been very much impressed....I thought i would give them a try and I was very happy, and excited that this lately has been a weekly occurrence shopping on here. My husband thinks these clothes make me look gorgeous and sexy...I have posted pics on facebook and I get TONS of compliments on my dresses and heels and how amazing I look. I tell every one I get them from AMIClubwear ..This is where i originally found this website. I have NEVER been happier and excited about clothes until now.. .I get on again today to find a nice dress for my sons wedding and couldnt resist..i bought many more things along with the dress...oh and did I mention they have awesome sales and great reasonable prices... I love,love,love this company and I will be shopping here for all my clothes from now on. I am a FOREVER customer... A BIG THANK YOU to AMI for making me one happy lady. Thanks a million. I gave them 5 stars but they deserve a 10. .
